channel.title: CVE Feed for BItdefender -- GravityZone Business Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BItdefender -- GravityZone Business Security

item.title: CVE-2021-3423|2024-09-17T00:41:26.663Z -- bitdefender -- gravityzone%20business%20security
item.description: Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability in the openssl component as used in Bitdefender GravityZone Business Security allows an attacker to load a third party DLL to elevate privileges. This issue affects Bitdefender GravityZone Business Security versions prior to 6.6.23.329.
